lender.name: Wendy & John
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping others.

lender.name: Marcel Ros
lender.loan_because: I think everybody should get a chance to follow their dreams and take their future in their own hands. As long as I am in the position to help a hand I will keep doing so - I know how difficult it is to get funding from any commercial banks or lenders!
lender.occupational_info: At ibc we believe all our business should benefit our employees, our clients and us as entrepreneurs. I travel 80% of my time to talk to our (prospective) clients and our consultants. I motivate, organize and sell.

lender.name: Floriana
lender.loan_because: I believe that by helping others, you are really helping yourself. This is the way to alleviate suffering in our world!
lender.occupational_info: My interest is in spreading the wisdom of Tibetan Buddhism so that we can serve others.

lender.name: Meghan & Eric
lender.loan_because:
As humans, we all have a responsibility to alleviate suffering and facilitate the self-actualization of our sisters and brothers around the world.
We are both vegan, feminist, atheist, and LGBTQ-allied. Lending on Kiva is one aspect of our activism.
lender.occupational_info: Meghan is a communications consultant. Eric is a transportation planner.

lender.name: Donna and Mike
lender.loan_because: efforts to advance the common good for all people is something core to our identities, and micro-financing seems to be a most effective way of doing so with our neighbors around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Donna keeps the home front working while Mike manages special information systems projects for his company's global customers.

lender.name: Clint & Cristy
lender.loan_because: My wife and I are building a family microcredit network in her hometown to empower the BoP dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Like farming and all the planning, cultivating and harvesting that goes into it, our technology work is in helping people help people. It's really that simple.

lender.name: Sydney
lender.loan_because: I feel good when I know I'm helping someone who really needs it.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: to help bring hope in a sometimes hopeless world. God is good...all the time.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: it was a fun family night activity

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Mr. & Mrs.
lender.loan_because: Ye ought to support the weak, and to remember the words of the Lord Jesus, how he said, It is more blessed to give than to receive.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.occupation: working with the World Food Programme in Darfur
lender.loan_because: it feels right

lender.name: Agorahaze.com
lender.loan_because: Proverbs 14:31 He who oppresses the poor shows contempt for their Maker, but whoever is kind to the needy honors God.
lender.occupational_info:
Colossians 3:23 Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord, not for men,
2 Timothy 2:15 Do your best to present yourself to God as one approved, a workman who does not need to be ashamed and who correctly handles the word of truth.
John 3:16 “For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.
Mark 12:30 - 31 Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind and with all your strength. The second is this: 'Love your neighbor as yourself.
http://agorahaze.com - coming soon...

lender.name: Nadir
lender.occupational_info: create websites, games, and more.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It started with a gift certificate, but my husband and I decided to loan more to do more.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes faucets. My job is to ensure that supplied parts are good before we use them to build faucets.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: As an atheist, I believe our highest moral duty is to help our fellow human beings and promote peace and prosperity around the world.

lender.name: Larissa
lender.loan_because: I would want the same type of opportunity, and I think it lines up with the attitude God wants us to have towards each other.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university (UBCO) library, helping students find books and journal articles to help them with their research.

lender.name: Nirupan
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a participant for many organizations and have raised thousands of dollars.

lender.name: Viktor
lender.loan_because: I like people who take risks to improve their lives and the lives of others
lender.occupational_info: I am helping customers to use the fitting information technology to solve their business problems.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't you?

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because:
I want to help people, my grandmother who I was very close with just passed away on Febuary 15th and she was a saint. I love her and strive to be like her every day
Nothing is an accident We are free to have it all We are whom be want to be Its in ourselvs to rise or fall
lender.occupational_info:
I'm a 7th Grader from Michigan and love to read, listen to music (the white stripes), and Broadway! The most recent voulenteer work I've done was voulenteer at my local Obama campaign for change office with Ashley Dowser, my team leader
Fired up! Ready to Go!

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: oh, I'm always trying to save the world one sea star at a time
lender.occupational_info: I encourage world peace by helping children find their own pathways (yep, saving the world again :)

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I believe that giving someone money is not as effective as helping them to earn more money themselves, and thus help others earn money too.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of people that help college professors choose books for their students to learn from.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: micro-lending, I believe, is the single greatest way to help others. If you return all that is repaid to you back into the system for others to use and repay; then it is like having your own charitable organization that will continue in perpetuity. Not to mention that helping others it is the right thing to do! :)
lender.occupational_info: I drive a van and deliver office supply orders to people.

lender.name: Merritt
lender.loan_because: I have struggled in the past, as a single parent, to provide for my children. Now that they are grown, I want to help other women to do the same for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I teach women and young adults to prepare for both college and job training. I help them learn how to learn, and to become good students, employees and parents.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: Women work hard for our families and ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: Computers

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I must live up to my family name.

lender.name: The Nguyen Family
lender.loan_because: We help where we can

lender.name: Nora
lender.loan_because: this is the least I could and should do to show gratitude for the blessings in my life

lender.name: VML
lender.loan_because: inner peace is achive from with in.
lender.occupational_info: Green Energy Technology

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to get a loan, and everyone should have the chance. I also like the idea of "giving a hand not a hand out."
lender.occupational_info: I work in retail/customer service for a catalog.

lender.name: Dana
lender.occupational_info: I teach my three children at home. They are my greatest priority and biggest blessing. We currently live in the UK. My husband works for the US Air Force in the medical field.

lender.name: Bobbi
lender.loan_because: when women are empowered, society is empowered, and it's a step forward to breaking the cycle of poverty.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: To put my money where my mouth is.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Verde Somos Nós
lender.loan_because: Acreditamos | We Believe
lender.occupational_info: Grupo Independente de Empregados BES Independent Group BES Employees

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a food manufacturing company.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do....

lender.name: Jake4d
lender.loan_because:
It has been said; "If you give a man a fish, he eats for a day. If you teach a man how to fish he eats for a lifetime"
I would like to modify that statement to; "If you teach a man to fish, you can sell him bait, he can sell his fish, everyone profits, and a little bit of poverty is eliminated."
Life is not a zero sum game.
lender.occupational_info: I climb TV and Radio broadcast towers and repair the strobe lights that keep planes from running into them. In my free time I like to read, write, think, design, create, imagine...

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: People should have the opportunity to make something of themselves wherever they come from.

lender.name: Custis Family
lender.loan_because: We like to help people. It is a great experience to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Dad is a pastor for teenagers (www.capitalchristian.org), mom works with computers, and daughters are in grade school.

lender.name: Alfred
lender.occupational_info: Design and build refineries and chemical plants.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to share my luck with others and help create a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach foreign languages to Americans.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I want to assist in developing small agricultural businesses.

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because: We are all related on this planet. Politics and religion interfere too often with basic humanity. I like the fact that these loans are helping people to help themselves. And I'm hopeful they will, in turn, pass it on.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: My daughter started the loans as my Birthday gifts.
lender.occupational_info: Keep employees happy and motivated.

lender.name: Clare
lender.loan_because: It's a simple way to bring us all together - and help people realize their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I do fundraising for an exceptional children's charity called Kids Help Phone in Canada

lender.name: Camille
lender.loan_because: I can. And because I have to. I have been given so much and am so lucky in the circumstances of my birth, my family and yes, my country. I want everyone to have access to the same things I have had.
lender.occupational_info: Before I was a nanny,working for children and their families. Now I am going back to school, after being out for over ten years!

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: have a bit of capacity to help
lender.occupational_info: information peddler

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: People have helped me along the way and this is something that I can do to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I make television commercials.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: my uncle made me. And, plus, I can like connect to people like everywhere. It's fascinating.
lender.occupational_info: Sitting in a classroom all day and listening to my iPod. Simotaneously. If that's how you spell it. I'm not kidding here. Okay. Yes, I am.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I want to help women born, by chance, into less fortunate circumstances than I was, to help themselves. I enjoy sewing as a hobby and have chosen to lend to women developing businesses in that line. If it were not for urban foxes I would love to have some laying hens, and so I will also lend to a poultry keeper when I see an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am disabled and find it difficult to go to work, so I look after our house and cook.

lender.name: Lou
lender.loan_because: it's not what you have or don't have, it's what you share.

lender.name: Mullen Family
lender.loan_because: We believe that everyone has the right to a better life.

lender.name: willem
lender.loan_because: I believe it is a good way to help people in developing nations to become self sufficient, and in a small way help fight poverty.

lender.name: The Six
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of capital, the spirit of the entrepreneur and the overall goodness of people.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I respond to emergency calls, and help people when there is no one else to turn to.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: It's nice to see that every bit goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Leland
lender.loan_because: I believe it's a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I entertain people by pretending to make things appear, change, and disappear.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I'm insanely wealthy and I need it as a tax shelter.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I can see what a big difference can be made to the lives of others by something as simple as a small loan. I am truly blessed and it is one small way to share ....
lender.occupational_info: I'm involved with the marginalized people of our society as I work in the AIDS education. I have seen personally the effects of AIDS in Africa, especially with orphans. My goal is to educate about HIV/AIDS and fight the associated stigma and discriminaiton

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: I want to see if I can make a difference in someones life.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: It's such an easy way to have an impact - and the same $25 can have an impact over and over again!

lender.name: Sumaiya
lender.loan_because: it feels GREAT to help people help themselves!

lender.name: ALEJANDRO
lender.loan_because: I HAVE NO JOB, I HAVE 36 YEARS, I WANT TO HELP AT HOME WITH THE COST, AND HAVE A WONDERFUL IDEA MODULES PUT IN INTERNET SITES AS MUCH CONCURRENT SHOPPING CENTERS, HOSPITALS, SCHOOLS, AIRPORT, WHERE THE PEOPLE WHO DO NOT HAVE AN AVAILABLE PORTABLE, YOU CAN ACCESS THE INTERNET TO A MODULUS BY MONEY YOU CAN BROWSE THE CUSTOMER AND TO WISH ALL YOU NEED TO DO WITH FLEXIBILITY AND EFFICIENCY AMONG THE ADVANTAGES OF THE BUSINESS IS THE LOW COST OF RENT, THEN NO would have to pay a high cost for the rental, and could have at least 5 TO 10 TEAMS THROUGHOUT THE CITY AND MY GOAL IS TO HAVE INTERNET IN ALL MODULES COLOMBIA. THE PARTIES TO DEVELOP SUCH MODULES are easy to get.
lender.occupational_info: CAN PROVIDE INTERNET SERVICE TO THE PEOPLE WHO DO NOT HAVE THE MONEY TO HAVE A COMPUTER IN YOUR HOME FOR YOUR CHILD MAKE THE TASKS AND STILL DO NOT HAVE MORE MONEY TO GET BROADBAND INTERNET IN THEIR HOMES.

lender.name: Jean Elyse
lender.loan_because: I like sending a bit of positive energy out into the world.
lender.occupational_info: An educator really does "touch the future!" KIVA provides another way to help that same future!

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: sometimes it takes so little to make a difference!!
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office that counsels women who want to become entrepreneurs

lender.name: Garrett
lender.loan_because: I like to help hard-working people out and think it is our job to do so. :)
lender.occupational_info: Well, on a regular school day I go to school from 7:30-2:30 and then I usually have basketball (either a practice or game), and then I come home and finish my homework.

lender.name: Cynthia & Richard
lender.loan_because: We want to help others to have the opportunities to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We teach Psychology and World Religions in college. We also host a website on feminine spirituality.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I'm always looking for new investments, and helping out in Places like the Phillipines, is a Plus
lender.occupational_info: I work on a farm, but its a lot diffrent, I mostly stand in a building stacking boxes of Eggs onto a Pallet.

lender.name: Jonah
lender.loan_because: its a good thing.

lender.name: Stine
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunity to make a difference.

lender.name: Mylam
lender.loan_because: they are amazing people who inspire me to do better.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to prevent disease for longer healthier lives.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I am so grateful for what God has given me and I want to share His blessings.

lender.name: RESIC FINANCIAL LLC
lender.loan_because: To decrease poverty we need to finance dreams, opportunities and encourage prosperity
lender.occupational_info: Commercial loan funder.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Mimisan

lender.name: Wes
lender.loan_because: To quote Pete, the AASFSHNR team captain: "[W]hen you know there's no superman coming to save humanity and you reflect on how closely related all humans are, you get a feeling that the more you contribute to the world the better it will be."

lender.name: Sliwicki

lender.occupational_info: I help people find jobs.

lender.name: Steve and Amy
lender.loan_because: We offer this gift, stepping into the Divine flow, knowing as we give that we are strengthened and prospered.
lender.occupational_info: Steve writes articles and reviews for websites, and Amy handles finances and payroll for a large company.

lender.name: Jocelyn
lender.loan_because: a great number of people have helped me out financially and otherwise throughout my life. Had I not had this support, I would not be where I am today. I am grateful and feel it is my responsibility to help others in the same way.
lender.occupational_info: I listen to young people and their families and help them find ways to get their needs met, be heard, and to work together to find solutions to problems.

lender.name: conundri
lender.loan_because: I believe in people helping people :)

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it possible for me to make a difference in someone's life for so little.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Its good to help people build a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I write software.

lender.occupational_info: TRABAJO CON ARCILLA , TRABAJO LA MADERA Y RECICLAJE...

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I know what it is to need just alittle extra to keep one's head above water. I admire anyone willing to work hard in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an "Animal Hospital". I take care of sick animals until they are well. I feel I am able to communicate with animals.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: Everybody has great ideas, and often just need support to make them come true.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a newspaper editing stories and writing headlines.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I like my money to do as much good as possible.
lender.occupational_info: I write software for law firms.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: Kiva is such remarkable example of what we had all hoped the Internet could accomplish and become! None of what is done here would have been possible ten years ago.
lender.occupational_info: I plan healthcare services, attempting to get the best health outcomes for the population at a sustainable cost.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: There is so much that seems so wrong in this world and this is something that can help make things right.

lender.name: will & becky
lender.loan_because: it feels good

lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because: People deserve opportunity.

lender.name: New
lender.loan_because: Helping others is the correct thing to do in this world
lender.occupational_info: New Wind Free Church........... There is a new wind in the world.......... Sadly there is a lack of mankind helping his fellow man......... The New wind is a movement to understand each other, be tolerant to other’s differences and to help the Fellow man..... We are created in our Gods Image. This idea is found in most of the Worlds Religions. ................ We all have an internal spark, Soul, chee, it goes by many names. .............. This idea is actually physically measured. Scientists have found in studies when one dies a very slight physical weight loss is detected. Is this the physical aspect of the soul leaving? Does it matter? Faith and good deeds are what matters. To nourish that spark we feel there is a need to have faith, be honest, kind and assist others where we can. ................ ............It’s how your God views your deeds and actions in the physical world that counts................... ..............A common thread found in most Religions through out the word is ‘Do the Right Thing by others’. What is the right thing? . A wise man said “if you have to think on if it’s the correct thing to do usually is not........... New Wind Free Church is a virtual Church where its members can commune with one another while seeking to do the right thing in our world and help others. That is the New Wind.................. Free means we are free of Government involvement. We seek no assistance from Government. Yet our Members are willing to assist others as they can when Government can not, will not or should not..................... We are open to all faiths who wish to do good in the name of there God, Goddess or Supreme Being..................................................................... "What is Serving God?’Tis doing Good to Man” Poor Richard "Well done is better than well said." Poor Richard 1737

lender.name: Charles
lender.occupational_info: Making a difference in lives

lender.name: Beata
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good that with a small gesture I can help someone else.

lender.name: Ralph

I think I do what most people should do. I learned today the existence of microcredit in the movie "8".
Je pense que je fais ce que tout le monde devrait faire. J'ai appris l'existence du micro-crédit dans le film "8".
lender.occupational_info: I work on a computer software that helps people who helps other people.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Because God has given me so much, helping others is just the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I support the technical equipment needed in making television programs.

lender.name: Eco Apes
lender.loan_because: We are a Roots and Shoots group of the Jane Goodall Institute made up of homeschool families. Our kids earned the loan money by redeeming bottles and cans. Together we work on projects to benefit people, animals and the environment. Our goal is to empower our youth to truly care for our planet and all of it's living creatures. "Saving ourselves by saving the trees, saving the animals and saving the earth!" - Eco Apes

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to reach out to me and to give me a chance. What we reap we sow.
lender.occupational_info: I help people live the life that they want

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, there are a lot of people out there whose lives can be improved with just a little bit of effort from us.
lender.occupational_info: I work with old, unpublished records like letters and photographs. You have to really love history for this sort of job.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: Maybe it can make the world a slightly better place.
lender.occupational_info: computer stuff

lender.name: Albert
lender.loan_because: Over the years I've been able to borrow money to grow my businesses and now I want to do the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: Our videos make people laugh, cry and explore their habits and thought patterns, so that the world will be a more educated and loving planet.

lender.loan_because: i'm able

lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others, and I know that I'm more well off than others.

lender.name: Anna
lender.occupational_info: Civil Servant/Government Employee

lender.name: Benno
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: God has given me more than I deserve, and the best way to repay Him is to help those in need. I believe that a loan is more than a simple gift. When a recipient repays, we both can help another.
lender.occupational_info: I write documents to help people do their jobs and understand technology.

lender.name: Philanthropic Kitty Kat
lender.loan_because: If you give a human a fish, that's one less for me, BUT if you teach a human how to fish, then they can catch more for me!
lender.occupational_info: As my life's work, it is my goal to encourage all silly humans to work, prosper and improve the global standard of living so that they may have the benefits of my kind for pets instead of for dinner. That and, of course, to make fun of the short hairs. Purr it forward.

lender.name: Marc
lender.occupational_info: I own four bicycle retail stores in the Baltimore area.

lender.name: Faith and Leah
lender.loan_because: we want to help make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I work at home taking care of my family and home.

lender.name: Mitesh
lender.loan_because: The more I learn about the poverty that afflicts the third world, the more I am amazed not just by how much we can help save lives, but by how effortlessly we can do so. So in short, I lend because I can - I believe in Kiva's mission and the means by which their mission seeks to be accomplished.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupation: Teacher and Advisor of STM Key Club

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I love this concept, and find it so inspiring to think that such a little can do so much for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: In the 'modern' Western world many people have 'forgotten' how to sing. I help them to remember by giving both individual lessons and running several Community Singing groups. This changes people's lives too!

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: There are brilliant people wanting to do more for themselves, their family and community. I like to help give them that opportunity.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Paula & Brian
lender.loan_because: We feel fortunate and want to share a little of our luck.

lender.name: Julio
lender.loan_because: Para ayudar a otras personas a enfrentar con exito las dificultades de sus emprendimientos.

lender.name: Carrie Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone to better their lives.

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage entrepreneurship, while helping those who cannot otherwise access financing. If a small loan will help someone succeed, count me in.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe in the dynamic results of combining ambition with compassion., and I love people.
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses to accurately report their achievements -- and hopefully, in the process, to help those businesses achieve their goals.

lender.name: Chessney
lender.loan_because: it is part of my purpose to be a global citizen and serve however I can.
lender.occupational_info:
I work for an international hunger relief organization called Stop Hunger Now. Our organization coordinates the distribution of food and other life-saving aid around the world. The organization is driven by a vision to end world hunger in our lifetime and a mission to provide food and life-saving aid to the world’s most destitute and hungry.
As the director of development it is my job to raise funds to support our mission and cause. I work with philanthropists and volunteers to further our cause.
I also serve as a youth leader on international mission trips to Nicaragua. I enjoy working with young people and seeing God work in their lives.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe it will work.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Finance professional working for a major western bank.

lender.name: Krystle
lender.loan_because: I've received so many blessings from God and it's my joy and duty to give back to the less fortunate as a good steward of those blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I write stories about business for a local newspaper.

lender.name: Ujwal
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of micro-finance and in Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working as a volunteer for Kiva in Philippines.

lender.name: Finance Nate
lender.loan_because: The world needs more entrepreneurs like myself and others that are listed on Kiva.org. Kiva does the world a better service by providing a bridge between entrepreneurs and companies like me.

lender.name: Ankur Singhal
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who are ready to take the next step and make this world a better place.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: it gives me joy to find a way enable other's dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am working on a web program to help other non-profits manage volunteers

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I do not have alot of money, but I feel that if $25.00 can make a huge difference in someone's life, then I am willing to do what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy working with people and helping them reach their dreams for success. When one of us suffers we all suffer. When one of us succeeds all the world becomes enlightened! Let's do our part.

lender.name: S4S at GW!
lender.loan_because: it's important to make a sustainable impact on those who don't have the same opportunities as university students in the United States.
lender.occupational_info: We are a team of Students 4 Sustainability, an organization providing marketplaces and microloans to entrepreneurs in the developing world.

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: If i'll have the extra money is a great feeling to help and to share it with other people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I manage and supervised multiple personnel in areas as follow: customer service; manage fuel reports; inventory; loss prevention, make nightly deposit. evaluation reports.

lender.name: City Development Team
lender.loan_because: This a a small way to help someone else out and be a part of their adventure.
lender.occupational_info: Local Authority Workers woring in the areas of economic development and environmental sustainability in Hutt City (Population 100,000) New Zealand.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: if I didn't, who would? We all need to be more responsible for the people of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help families just like yours find a place to call home.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and hope this will make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a new company and I am in charge of advertising as well as communications with potential and current clients.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I care about the global economic crisis and those affected by it.

lender.name: Raffaella
lender.occupation: Director young and gender policies Municipality
lender.loan_because: My main concern is gender cooperation

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I loan because I respect those who work hard to earn their living, just as my parents did when they first moved to the U.S. When I finish graduate school, I hope to further encourage and aid individuals in developing their ideas into successful businesses.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I believe that hardwork always bring results. I want my money to go to those who really deserve help.
lender.occupational_info: I work at Northrop Grumman Global Mobility Office (GMO) to assist the companies project managers on their international assignments.

lender.name: Amelia
lender.loan_because: I love.

lender.name: Francisco
lender.loan_because: we all need money

lender.name: Big Daddy
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I am a bum
